comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Most probably A3D-1 or YA3D-1 Skywarrior Bu No 135408. Majority of tail and outer wing painted in dark color. Note rear gun turret and radar dome. Taking off from airfield runway. If A3D-1 Skywarrior 135408, this was used by the NATC (Naval Air Test Center) for carrier suitability trials between Sept. 1956 & June 1957. On January 4th 1960 the aircraft was lost over the sea during a training mission in wintertime. While serving with VAH-123, the A3D/A-3B Replacement Training unit. Go to this other 'flickr' pic for more info: www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4564690804/
